button._learnMore.comment: The text shown on the button to learn more about the service.
button._apply.comment: The text shown on the button to apply for the service.
button._introduction.comment: The text shown on the button to view the service introduction.
button._apis.comment: The text shown on the button to view the API description.
button._pricing.comment: The text shown on the button to view the pricing information.

field._apis.comment: The API of the service, API is a form of the Online service.
field._proxies.comment: The proxy of the service, Proxy is a form of the Online service, means the HTTP Proxy used for transferring the data.

message._free.comment: The text shown when the service is free, which means the service is free of charge.
message._around.comment: The text shown when the price is around a certain value.
message._welcomeCredits.comment: The text shown when the service provides welcome credits for free
message._appliedCount.comment: The text shown when the number of applications is counted.
message.indexTitle: Your smart choice for digital services
message._indexTitle.comment: The title of the index page.
message.indexSubtitle: Empower your work and life with standardized excellence in services.
message._indexSubtitle.comment: The subtitle of the index page.
message._fromPrice.comment: The text shown before the price.
message.packages: We offer a variety of packages for credits, the more packages you buy, the more discounts you get.
message._packages.comment: The text shown when the service provides packages for credits.
message._offer.comment: The text shown when the service provides an offer.
message._partnersTitle.comment: The title of the partners section.

title._apis.comment: The API of the service, API is a form of the Online service.
title._proxies.comment: The proxy of the service, Proxy is a form of the Online service, means the HTTP Proxy used for transferring the data.
title._packages.comment: The packages of the service, the packages are used for buying credits, for example, the service provides 3 packages, 100$ for 100 credits, 200$ for 200 credits, 300$ for 300 credits.

unit._credit.comment: Credit means the virtual currency used in the API service
unit._Credit.comment: Credit means the virtual currency used in the API service, this is the capitalized form
unit._credits.comment: Credits means the virtual currency used in the API service, this is the plural form
unit._Credits.comment: Credits means the virtual currency used in the API service, this is the capitalized and the plural form
unit._call.comment: Call means the times of the API service which has been called
unit._Call.comment: Call means the times of the API service which has been called, this is the capitalized form
unit._calls.comment: Calls means the times of the API service which has been called, this is the plural form
unit._Calls.comment: Calls means the times of the API service which has been called, this is the capitalized and the plural form
unit._MB.comment: MB means Megabyte, a unit of digital information storage
unit._GB.comment: GB means Gigabyte, a unit of digital information storage
